name: CreateSpanMetric
description:
Create a metric based on ingested spans in your organization.

Use this tool to create a metric using your ingested spans. It will return the created span-based metric object if successful.

parameters.name: span_metric_definition
parameters.description: JSON object defining the new span-based metric, including attributes like compute, filter, and group_by.

aggregation_type.description: The type of aggregation to use.

include_percentiles.description:
Toggle to include or exclude percentile aggregations for distribution metrics.
Only present when the `aggregation_type` is `distribution`.

path.description: The path to the value the span-based metric will aggregate on (only used if the aggregation type is a "distribution").

compute.description: The compute rule to compute the span-based metric.

query.description: The search query - following the span search syntax.

filter.description: The span-based metric filter. Spans matching this filter will be aggregated in this metric.

path.description: The path to the value the span-based metric will be aggregated over.

tag_name.description: Eventual name of the tag that gets created. By default, the path attribute is used as the tag name.

group_by.description: The rules for the group by.

attributes.description: The object describing the Datadog span-based metric to create.

id.description: The name of the span-based metric.

type.description: The type of resource. The value should always be spans_metrics.

value_schema.description: The definition of the new span-based metric.
